nodes.documentation:
@notice This is a receipt registry abstraction.
@author Guillermo Salazar.
nodes.name: IReceiptRegistry
NewReceiptCreated
createReceipt
getReceipts
hasReceipts

createReceipt(address,address,string,str.details: It can be invoked only by the company owner/creator.The receipt parameter values must be not empty.

params._company: the company address where the employee works.
params._employee: the employee address who receives the receipt payment.
params._path: the IPFS path where the receipt was stored.
params._receiptHash: the IPFS hash from the receipt document.

params._company: the company where the employee got the receipts.
params._employee: the employee address who owns the receipts.

getReceipts(address,address).return: It returns a list of receipt payments for a specific company/employee relation.

params._company: the company where the employee got the receipts.
params._employee: the employee address who owns the receipts.

hasReceipts(address,address).return: true if the employee has receipt payments in the company. Otherwise it returns false.

createReceipt(address,address,string,str.notice: It creates a receipt payment associated to a company and employee.

getReceipts(address,address).notice: It gets all the receipt payments for a specific company and employee relation.

hasReceipts(address,address).notice: It tests whether a company and employee relation has receipts.

userdoc.notice: This is a receipt registry abstraction.
